FuncDef: This command configures the NAT pool of this policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the NAT pool, up to 32 characters.

Specifies the router instance the pool belongs to, either by router name or service ID. Values-1 to 2147483647
svc-name - a string up to 64 characters.. ParamDefault: Default- Base
Specifies the name of the service, up to 64 characters.
